_metadata.description: Ground truth extraction results for meeting-002.vtt golden dataset
_metadata.purpose: Golden test data for ts-extractor validation - precision/recall measurement
notes: Contains: 16 action items, 8 decisions, 5 questions, 12 topics
Comprehensive sprint planning scenario for stress testing

action_items.text: Review dashboard mockups in Figma and provide feedback

citation.text_snippet: Charlie, can you review the mockups and provide feedback by end of day tomorrow?
I'll have the integration document ready by Wednesday.

action_items.text: Send PCI compliance documentation to Diana for review

citation.text_snippet: Diana, I'll send you the compliance documentation to review.

action_items.text: Implement theme system for dark mode support

citation.text_snippet: I'll implement the theme system first. It needs to be in place before the dashboard components.

action_items.text: Create API specification document and share OpenAPI spec

citation.text_snippet: I'll share the OpenAPI spec by tomorrow morning.

action_items.text: Add Redis caching for dashboard summary endpoint

citation.text_snippet: I'll add Redis caching for the summary endpoint.
I'll provision the Redis cluster.

action_items.text: Share Stripe API keys with Eve through secrets management system

citation.text_snippet: I'll send them through our secrets management system today.

action_items.text: Set up test Stripe account and share access with Diana

citation.text_snippet: I'll set up the test account and share access with Diana.

action_items.text: Update design spec with animation priorities (P1 and P2)

citation.text_snippet: please update the design spec with animation priorities by tomorrow

action_items.text: Document test card numbers and scenarios for Stripe testing

citation.text_snippet: I'll document the test card numbers and scenarios.

action_items.text: Implement feature flag for payment rollout

citation.text_snippet: I'll implement a feature flag so we can disable payments without a deployment.

action_items.text: Add feature flag to feature toggle system

citation.text_snippet: Yes, I'll add it today.

action_items.text: Have Redis and feature flag system ready

citation.text_snippet: I'll have Redis and the feature flag system ready by Wednesday.

action_items.text: Coordinate with Bob on test data setup

citation.text_snippet: I'll coordinate with Bob on the test data setup.

action_items.text: Update sprint backlog and communicate timelines to stakeholders

citation.text_snippet: I'll update the sprint backlog and communicate timelines to stakeholders.

decisions.rationale: Best API documentation and robust webhook system based on evaluation of Stripe, PayPal, and Adyen

citation.text_snippet: We decided to use Stripe for payment processing.

decisions.text: Implement auto-detection with manual override for theme preference
decisions.rationale: Auto-detection from system settings with user override option

citation.text_snippet: We decided to implement auto-detection with manual override for theme preference.

decisions.text: Store theme preference in user profile for cross-device sync
decisions.rationale: Preferences sync across devices instead of local storage

citation.text_snippet: We decided to store theme preference in user profile for cross-device sync.

decisions.text: Use JSON:API format for API consistency

citation.text_snippet: We agreed to use JSON:API format for consistency.

decisions.rationale: High traffic expected on dashboard once launched

citation.text_snippet: We decided to use Redis for dashboard caching.

decisions.text: Payment stories take precedence over dashboard stories if time runs short
decisions.rationale: Payment is the priority for this sprint

citation.text_snippet: We decided that payment stories take precedence over dashboard stories if we run short on time.

decisions.rationale: Reduces sprint from 35 points to 32, within velocity of 30

citation.text_snippet: We agreed to defer payment receipts to Sprint 8.

decisions.text: Use feature flags for payment rollout
decisions.rationale: Rollback strategy - can disable payments without deployment

citation.text_snippet: We decided to use feature flags for the payment rollout.

questions.text: What about the infrastructure requirements? Does Stripe require any special setup on our end?
questions.answer_summary: Need webhook endpoints and SSL certificates; Eve to create webhook infrastructure using Terraform

citation.text_snippet: What about the infrastructure requirements? Does Stripe require any special setup on our end?

answer_citation.text_snippet: We'll need to set up webhook endpoints and configure SSL certificates.

questions.text: What about PCI compliance? Do we need to handle card data directly?
questions.answer_summary: No, use Stripe Elements - card data never touches servers

citation.text_snippet: What about PCI compliance? Do we need to handle card data directly?

answer_citation.text_snippet: No, we'll use Stripe Elements. Card data never touches our servers.

questions.text: Should we store theme preference in local storage or in the user profile on the backend?
questions.answer_summary: Store in user profile for cross-device sync

citation.text_snippet: Should we store the preference in local storage or in the user profile on the backend?

answer_citation.text_snippet: Let's store it in the user profile. That way preferences sync across devices.

questions.text: What's the testing timeline for the dashboard? I need to coordinate with my team.
questions.answer_summary: Dashboard ready Tuesday, testing Wednesday through Friday

citation.text_snippet: What's the testing timeline for the dashboard?

answer_citation.text_snippet: I can have the main dashboard ready by next Tuesday.

questions.text: What's our rollback strategy if the payment integration has issues in production?
questions.answer_summary: Feature flag to disable payments without deployment

citation.text_snippet: What's our rollback strategy if the payment integration has issues in production?

answer_citation.text_snippet: I'll implement a feature flag so we can disable payments without a deployment.

topics.title: Sprint Objectives Introduction
topics.summary: Alice introduces Sprint 7 focused on payment integration and dashboard redesign. Frank has completed mockups.

topics.title: Payment Gateway Selection
topics.summary: Bob recommends Stripe after evaluating Stripe, PayPal, Adyen. Decision made to use Stripe.

topics.title: PCI Compliance Discussion
topics.summary: Diana asks about PCI compliance. Decision: Use Stripe Elements so card data never touches servers.

topics.title: Dashboard Redesign Walkthrough
topics.summary: Frank presents new dashboard design: overview widgets, recent activity, quick actions, dark mode.

topics.title: Theme System and Preferences
topics.summary: Decisions: auto-detect with manual override for theme, store in user profile for cross-device sync.

topics.title: Dashboard Testing Timeline
topics.summary: Diana coordinates testing: dashboard ready Tuesday, testing Wednesday-Friday.

topics.title: API Dependencies and Caching
topics.summary: Three new API endpoints needed. Redis caching for summary, no caching for real-time activity feed.

topics.title: Staging Environment and Secrets
topics.summary: Staging ready with CI/CD. Bob to share Stripe keys, set up test account for Diana.

topics.title: User Stories Breakdown
topics.summary: 15 stories identified: payment, dashboard, infrastructure. Payment takes priority if time short.

topics.title: Animation and Story Points
topics.summary: Simple animations first. 35 points exceeds velocity of 30. Defer payment receipts to Sprint 8.

topics.title: Sprint Goals Confirmation
topics.summary: Three goals: Stripe integration, dashboard with theme support, infrastructure ready.

topics.title: Meeting Recap and Action Items
topics.summary: Alice recaps action items for Bob, Charlie, Eve, Diana, Frank, and herself.
